body:
Fuk this BS! Netflix and MGM will just fuk it up and not tell the story properly with there "breakout star" lmao

We know the title of the movie for this, Deep Fucking Value. Should he allow it. 
I've produced 2 low budget features, 2 shorts, and years of entertainment experience, it's what I do for work.  Need to make this our way, and tell a real story that's more like Super Troppers!

Contacting actors and getting people involved is easy with the right script and potential financing.

And yes I'm holding
